description: Adlung writes: �Kleiner Cymbel is of one rank (von einer Pfeife), and repeats frequently.� Audsley mentions Kleincimbel only in passing, stating that the prefix klein indicates either octave pitch or small scale.
examplesDescription: Kleine Zimbel, Rueckpositiv; Aula, University of Freiburg, Freiburg, Germany; Walcker 1955. This is the only known example.
